dmca.title: Google Groups DMCA - WhyMarketsTurn
dmca.body:
Sender Information:
Dan Morikawa
WhyMarketsTurn.com
809 Browning Dr
Arlington, TX 76010
281-685-4932

Date: Jan 1, 2007

Google Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Fax: (650) 963-3255, Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Re: THIS IS A DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE. Infringments of Why Markets Turn Copyrights and Trademark

Dear Sir or Madam:

This letter serves as my notification to you under the Digital Millenium Copyright Act that your site is infringing our copyrights as described below.

1. Identity of the copyrighted work that I believe has been infringed upon. I am the owner of WhyMarketsTurn.com which publishes a software "Why Markets Turn", the website and the trademark "Why Markets Turn" #77042344

2.Identity of the material that I claim is infringing upon the copyrighted work listed in item #1 above.

Message-ID: <1164499977.162692.41050@h54g2000cwb.googlegroups.com>
Message-ID: <1163556170242306.5070@m73g2000cwd.googlegroups.com>
Message-ID: <1163555760.623136.303540@m7g2000cwm.googlegroups.com> 
Message-ID: <1163555498.670372.56650@e3g2000cwe.googlegroups.com> 
Message-ID: <1163363881.184114.61400@h48g2000cwc.googlegroups.com> 
Message-ID: <1162833771.894740.150270@e3g2000cwe.googlegroups.com> 
Message-ID: <1162833472.481126.130210@e3g2000cwe.googlegroups.com> 
Message-ID: <1161034904.310709.189720@b28g2000cwb.googlegroups.com>

3.Information to contact me.
Dan Morikawa
http://wwww.whymarketsturn.com
admin@whymarketsturn.com

4.Provide information, if possible, sufficient to permit Google to notify the owner/administrator of the webpage that allegedly contains infringing material (email address is preferred). yourtrader2000@yahoo.com

5.I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the. notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

7. I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

On behalf of WhyMarketsTurn.com, I hereby, request that you immediately disable and take down the infringing materials. THIS IS A DMCA TAKE DOWN NOTICE.

Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter. Please advise us regarding what actions you take.

Sincerely,

Dan Morikawa
http://wwww.whymarketsturn.com
admin@whymarketsturn.com
